data.message: If it wasn't for Facebook, I would have never gotten the idea to visit my friend from the past who I have made a terrible mistake with and ask him to forgive me for my actions. Ten years have gone by and now is the time to return to him and ask for forgiveness so I can forgive myself

replies.message: Thank you for sharing your story, Mark. We appreciate you being a part of our community. -Chantal

Hi Lukáš. You can't request to have your Page verified, but there are other ways to help the people who like your Page know that your identity is authentic. Learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1uykBvf Take care. -Leigh
